attributes.action: Apply pressure to the BBC to persude it to stop wasting licence payer's money on the Eurovision Song Contest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the opening up of the Eurovision Song Contest to more and more countries and with the introduction of telephone voting this contest has become a total farce.
I have noted that even Terry Wogan, once a great supporter of the Eurovision, has stated that he may well not be a broadcaster in the future.
So, is it not time then that the BBC re-though it's position on this program and stopped wasting licence payer's money.
The money saved could be better spent on quality programs including the expansion of HD TV.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
